EmailTemplate.name: VirtualBGA Competition.VirtualBGA Competition Email Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Discover Possibilities of Flight. Made Virtual.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thanks again for taking the time to experience our VirtualBGA Experience. Below you will find links to further information about the cockpit and cabin products we featured.
Cockpit
SmartRunway®/SmartLanding® <https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-systems/smartrunway-smartlanding>
FMS 6.1 <https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/flight-management-systems/fmz-2000>
SmartView® <https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-systems/smartview-synthetic-vision-system>
Satcom Safety Services <https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/priorities/connectivity>
IntuVue® <https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-systems/weather-radar/intuvue-3d-weather-radar>
Cockpit Display Upgrades <https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/cockpit-displays>
Cabin
Ovation Select <https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/cabin-entertainment>
AIS 2000 Live TV <http://www51.honeywell.com/aero/common/documents/myaerospacecatalog-documents/BA_brochures-documents/AIS_2000_Satellite_TV_Brochure.pdf>
JetWave <http://www.satcom1.com/marketing/documents/tech/N61-1248-000-002_JetWave%20Satcom%20Terminal_LR.PDF>
Satcom <https://aerospace.honeywell.com/priorities/connectivity>
CNX Cabin Network Solutions <https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/communication-nav-and-surveillance/satellite-communications/cabin-networking>
Our expertise isn’t limited to just business aviation. In fact, our products can be found on virtually every type of commercial airliner, business and general aviation jet, military aircraft and space vehicle in operation today. From takeoff to landing, Honeywell solutions help make flying safer, more reliable, more efficient, and more cost effective. Visit aerospace.honeywell.com <http://aerospace.honeywell.com> for more information.
